changeSet.author: anton
changeSet.sql: update College set communication_key=(select c.communication_key from CommunicationKey c where c.collegeId=id and communication_key_type='REPLICATION')
update College set communication_key_status=(select c.communication_key_status from CommunicationKey c where c.collegeId=id and communication_key_type='REPLICATION')

changeSet.author: ksenia

preConditions.onFailMessage: There are path duplicates in WebURLAlias
preConditions.sqlCheck: SELECT count(*) FROM (SELECT webSiteId, urlPath, count(*) FROM WebURLAlias GROUP BY webSiteId, urlPath HAVING count(*) > 1) duplicates

changeSet.comment: If the precondition fails, then there are the duplicates: WebURLAlias with the same webSiteId and urlPath or the index has been already created

changeSet.author: ksenia

not.sqlCheck: select count(*) from PaymentIn where type is null

changeSet.sql: update PaymentIn set type=2 where type is null and creditCardNumber is not null;
update PaymentIn set type=0 where type is null and creditCardNumber is null;

changeSet.author: ksenia
changeSet.sql: alter table PaymentIn change type type smallint(6) NOT NULL DEFAULT 2

changeSet.author: xenia
changeSet.sql: update College set timeZone='Australia/Perth' where id=3219

changeSet.author: anton
changeSet.sql: update Invoice set source='O' where description='Refund for enrolments' and source='W'

changeSet.author: olga
changeSet.sql: update TutorRole set isConfirmed=true where confirmedDate is not null;
update TutorRole set isConfirmed=false where confirmedDate is null;

changeSet.author: viacheslav
changeSet.sql: update Contact set uniqueCode=SUBSTR(MD5(RAND()), 1, 16) where uniqueCode is null;

changeSet.author: anton
changeSet.sql: alter table Invoice change column status status VARCHAR(30)

changeSet.author: anton
changeSet.sql: alter table Enrolment change column status status_tmp VARCHAR(30)
alter table Enrolment add column status INTEGER
update Enrolment set status=2 where status_tmp in ('Pending', 'In Transaction')
update Enrolment set status=3 where status_tmp='Success'
update Enrolment set status=4 where status_tmp='Failed'
update Enrolment set status=8 where status_tmp='Cancelled'
update Enrolment set status=9 where status_tmp='Refunded'
alter table Enrolment change column status status INTEGER not null

changeSet.author: viacheslav
changeSet.sql: ALTER TABLE PaymentIn ADD INDEX session (sessionId ( 8 ) );

changeSet.author: dzmitry
changeSet.sql: insert into Preference (collegeId, name, value_string) select c.id, 'payment.gateway.type', case when c.paymentGatewayType = 2 then 'PAYMENT_EXPRESS' when c.paymentGatewayType = 0 then 'TEST' when c.paymentGatewayType is null then 'DISABLED' end from College c where c.billingCode is not null;

changeSet.author: artyom
changeSet.sql: update SystemUser u set u.siteId = (select id from Site s where s.angelId=u.defaultAdministrationCentreId and s.collegeId=u.collegeId) where u.defaultAdministrationCentreId is not null;

changeSet.author: artyom
changeSet.sql: ALTER TABLE SystemUser ADD CONSTRAINT defaultAdministrationCentre FOREIGN KEY (siteId) REFERENCES Site (id) ON DELETE NO ACTION;
